events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: t: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: t: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: t: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: t: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: t: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: t: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: t: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: t: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: CATL and Stellantis Sign MoU for LFP Battery Supply and Joint Venture Exploration
events.wd_label: CATL and Stellantis Sign MoU for LFP Battery Supply and Joint Venture Exploration
events.wd_description: CATL and Stellantis have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to supply LFP battery cells and modules for Stellantis' EV production in Europe and explore the possibility of establishing a joint venture.
events.description: CATL and Stellantis have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to supply LFP battery cells and modules for Stellantis' EV production in Europe and explore the possibility of establishing a joint venture.

events.name: MoU Announcement
events.wd_description: CATL will supply Stellantis with LFP battery cells and modules for EV production in Europe under the signed MoU, and both parties are exploring the possibility of establishing a joint venture.
events.description: CATL will supply Stellantis with LFP battery cells and modules for EV production in Europe under the signed MoU, and both parties are exploring the possibility of establishing a joint venture.

events.name: Long-Term Strategic Cooperation
events.wd_description: The MoU outlines long-term cooperation in developing advanced technology roadmaps and exploring new opportunities in the battery value chain.
events.description: The MoU outlines long-term cooperation in developing advanced technology roadmaps and exploring new opportunities in the battery value chain.

events.name: t: Technology Roadmap Development
events.wd_description: CATL and Stellantis will jointly develop advanced technology roadmaps to support Stellantis' cutting-edge electric vehicles.
events.description: CATL and Stellantis will jointly develop advanced technology roadmaps to support Stellantis' cutting-edge electric vehicles.

events.name: t: Battery Value Chain Opportunities
events.wd_description: Both companies will actively explore new collaboration opportunities to enhance the battery value chain.
events.description: Both companies will actively explore new collaboration opportunities to enhance the battery value chain.

events.name: Stellantis' Strategic Goals
events.wd_description: The collaboration supports Stellantis' "Dare Forward 2030" strategy, aiming for all passenger cars sold in Europe to be fully electric by 2030 and achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2038.
events.description: The collaboration supports Stellantis' "Dare Forward 2030" strategy, aiming for all passenger cars sold in Europe to be fully electric by 2030 and achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2038.

events.name: t: LFP Battery Technology
events.wd_description: LFP battery technology offers long life and high thermal stability, helping Stellantis provide high-quality, durable, and affordable electric vehicles.
events.description: LFP battery technology offers long life and high thermal stability, helping Stellantis provide high-quality, durable, and affordable electric vehicles.

events.name: t: Net-Zero Carbon Emissions Goal
events.wd_description: Stellantis plans to become a net-zero carbon emissions company by 2038 as part of its long-term strategy.
events.description: Stellantis plans to become a net-zero carbon emissions company by 2038 as part of its long-term strategy.
